member.name: T:LSS.HCM.Core.DataObjects.Models.Compartment
member.summary: Represents compartment as a sequence of compartment units.

member.name: M:LSS.HCM.Core.DataObjects.Models.Compartment.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Compartment class to the value indicated by all members.

members.member:
Initializes a new instance of the Compartment class to the value indicated by all members.
Parameters. An request Transaction Id. An request Locker Id where compartment will be opened. List of compartment id's which will be opened. Jsone Web Token Flag.By default will be false, If you want to enable then specify this flag true. Shared secret between middleware and Hardware Control Module, where HCM will decode JWT using provided secret key. Json web token with specified format which will contains JOSE Header Algoritm(HMAC SHA256 (Base64Url)),JWS Payload (Identity (Must Include Transaction Id)) MongoDB connection string MongoDB database name where specific collection is available. MongoDB collection name.

Initializes a new instance of the Compartment class to the value indicated by all members.
Parameters. An request Transaction Id. An request Locker Id where compartment will be opened. List of compartment id's which will be opened. Jsone Web Token credentials receive Flag, shared key and Token. Database credentials receive connection string name, database name and collection name of MongoDB.

member.name: P:LSS.HCM.Core.DataObjects.Models.Compartment.TransactionId
member.summary: Gets and sets the transaction Id in the current Compartment object.
member.returns: The Transaction Id in the current Compartment.

member.name: P:LSS.HCM.Core.DataObjects.Models.Compartment.LockerId
member.summary: Gets and sets the Locker Id in the current Compartment object.
member.returns: The Locker Id in the current Compartment.

member.name: P:LSS.HCM.Core.DataObjects.Models.Compartment.CompartmentIds
member.summary: Gets and sets the list of Compartment Id in the current Compartment object.
member.returns: The Compartment Ids in the current Compartment.

member.name: P:LSS.HCM.Core.DataObjects.Models.Compartment.JwtCredentials
member.summary: Gets and sets the Jwt Credentials in the current Compartment object.
member.returns: The Jwt Credentials in the current Compartment.

member.summary: Gets and sets the Data BaseCredentials in the current Compartment object.
member.returns: The Data BaseCredentials in the current Compartment.

members.member:
Initializes a new instance of the Compartment class to the value indicated by all members.
Parameters. MongoDB connection string MongoDB database name where specific collection is available. MongoDB collection name.

members.member:
Initializes a new instance of the Compartment class to the value indicated by all members.
Parameters. Jsone Web Token Flag.By default will be false, If you want to enable then specify this flag true. Shared secret between middleware and Hardware Control Module, where HCM will decode JWT using provided secret key. Json web token with specified format which will contains JOSE Header Algoritm(HMAC SHA256 (Base64Url)),JWS Payload (Identity (Must Include Transaction Id))
